sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Test Payload</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gg = new GlideRecord('incident'); gg.get('9da1ec3b47170210cd4e1ce4316d432c'); requestBody = '{ "sn_task" : "' + current.sys_id + '", "request_type" : "MAIH", "payload" : "' + current.number + '" , "allocation_details": "' + current.category + '" }'; gg.work_notes = requestBody; gg.update();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-07-26 09:03:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>120a1ffa83ef0a10c6695855eeaad37c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Test Payload</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_120a1ffa83ef0a10c6695855eeaad37c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-07-26 10:43:48</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
